description: Mystical Mahabaleshwar is a quaint hill station known for its scenic beauty and of course, strawberries. Nestled in the Sahyadri Mountain Ranges, it was the summer capital of the Bombay province during the colonial rule.  Gifted with salubrious weather, evergreen forests, rolling hills, serene lakes, sparkling waterfalls, breathtaking viewpoints and ancient architectural splendor, the hill station promises you a rejuvenating time in the lap of nature.
name: Mahabaleshwar
